testsuite.name: mvc.functional.GetTest

testcase.name: should_response_get_request

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Expected: is "this is the house index page, there are 5 houses" but: was "HTTP ERROR: 503
Problem accessing /sample/house/index. Reason:
 Service Unavailable
Powered by Jetty://"
